page.title: 01BLOCK SUMMARY
page.content: This 'block' is situated{south of {Rotherham}and contains the villages of {Treeton, Catcliffe}and most of { Brinsworth.}It is roughly divided north-south by the{River Rother,}and east-west by the{M1 Motorway. { Industrial employment}is provided by{British Rail}at{Tinsley, N.C.B.}at{ {Treeton, I.C.I.}at{Orgreave}and the{ {C.E.G.B.}at{Brinsworth.}Many local people commute to{Sheffield}or{ {Rotherham. { }Much of the lower land on either side of the{Rother}has been left undeveloped - a history of{flooding. { }The area has been settled a long time. Both{Brinsworth}and{Treeton}are mentioned in the original{Domesday {Book. }
